Package harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

Class TUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TUtils
  • public class TUtils
extends Object
    General helper class for the whole TombolaLib library, containing some general constants values (i.e. hard limits for the card generation algorithms, names of default choices or default values) and some general helper methods.
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Harry G. Potter harry.g.potter@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String[] AVAILABLE_GENERATION_METHODS
      Helper string array containing the symbolic names of all supporter list of series generation algorithms implemented and available so far.
      static String FIELD_DELIMITER
      A simple constant to maintain the field separator in csv files
      static String LIB_NAME
      The name of this Java library
      static String LIB_VERSION
      Current version of this Java library
      static int MAX_SERIES
      An hard limit to prevent list of series of cards with too many elements to be properly managed.
      static int NOVANTA
      A simple constant to name the highest value in the game of the Tombola
      static String STRING_DELIMITER
      A simple constant to maintain the delimiter for character strings in csv files

      TUtils()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int[] addToVectorV​(int[] v, int[] w)
      Sum 'element by element' the two vectors passed as input arguments.
      static int compareSubVectors​(int[] v1, int[] v2, int start1, int start2, int length)
      Compare, 'element by element', two vectors or two sub-vectors returning the count of equal couple of numbers. Used to verify how many equal numbers there are within two cards or two card rows.
      static int decina​(int number)
      Return the "tombola tens" to which the passed number belongs to. In other words, return the column index on a tombola card of the number passed as argument.
      static ITSetFactory getSetFactoryByType​(String factoryType)
      Return an ITSetFactory interface implementing object providing the list of series of card generation algorithm indicated by the name in input. Available algorithms are listed within the AVAILABLE_GENERATION_METHODS public array.
      static String prettyMilliseconds​(long milliseconds)
      Helper method that prepare a pretty string (in English) showing a time duration.

    • Method Detail

      • getSetFactoryByType

        public static ITSetFactory getSetFactoryByType​(String factoryType)
        Return an ITSetFactory interface implementing object providing the list of series of card generation algorithm indicated by the name in input. Available algorithms are listed within the AVAILABLE_GENERATION_METHODS public array.
        Parameters:
        factoryType - the symbolic name used to identify the type of the desired card series factory
        Returns:
        an ITSetFactory interface implementing object providing the list of series of card generation algorithm indicated by the name in input.
        See Also:
        AVAILABLE_GENERATION_METHODS

      • decina

        public static final int decina​(int number)
        Return the "tombola tens" to which the passed number belongs to. In other words, return the column index on a tombola card of the number passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        number - to which evaluate the proper column index on a tombola card.
        Returns:
        the column index of the number is properly displaced on a tombola card.

      • addToVectorV

        public static final int[] addToVectorV​(int[] v,
                                       int[] w)
        Sum 'element by element' the two vectors passed as input arguments.
        Parameters:
        v - first vector to add
        w - second vector to add
        Returns:
        the same first vector passed as input, whose element have been incremented by values of second vector w.

      • compareSubVectors

        public static final int compareSubVectors​(int[] v1,
                                          int[] v2,
                                          int start1,
                                          int start2,
                                          int length)
        Compare, 'element by element', two vectors or two sub-vectors returning the count of equal couple of numbers. Used to verify how many equal numbers there are within two cards or two card rows.
        Parameters:
        v1 - first vector source to compare
        v2 - second vector source to compare
        start1 - the first index within v1 vector to start to compare
        start2 - the first index within v2 vector to start to compare
        length - how many number from each vector must be compared
        Returns:
        the total count of couple of equal numbers found.

      • prettyMilliseconds

        public static final String prettyMilliseconds​(long milliseconds)
        Helper method that prepare a pretty string (in English) showing a time duration.  Usually used to show on screen or on files the time elapsed to prepare a list of series.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - the elapsed time expressed in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the pretty string ready to be showed on screen or printed
